results.title: Romeo and Juliet (Prokofiev)
results.creator_credit: Rudolf Nureyev, Patricia Foy and ITC-RAI Teatro Alla Scala
results.brief_description: Television production recorded at Palazzo dello Sport, Milan, Italy of William Shakespeare’s tragedy, “Romeo and Juliet”, featuring principal ballet dancers Rudolf Nureyev (Romeo), Carla Fracci (Juliet) and Margot Fonteyn (Lady Capulet). Directed by Nureyev with the cast from his La Scala, Milan production, the Corps de Ballet of Teatro Alla Scala, director Giuseppe Carbone, with music by Prokofiev played by the La Scala Orchestra conducted by Michel Sasson.

results.title: Romeo and Juliet (PC)
results.creator_credit: BBC-TV, Harper Collins and ATTICA Cybernetics
results.brief_description: Enter the world of Shakespeare’s Romeo and Juliet wIth this truly multimedia performance on CD-ROM. Dramatically enhance your understanding of the play as you watch, read and listen in an “Interactive theatre” on your PC. The CD-ROM includes a complete audio performance of the play, which is enhanced by synchronised on-screen text presented with hypertext study notes. It also provides a wealth of information on the language and meaning in Shakespeare, costumes and set-design, as well as background information on the life and times of the Great Bard himself. This is an invaluable resource for students, teachers and anyone interested in exploring one of Shakespeare’s most popular plays. Included in the package are a teacher’s guide to the play, a copy of The Alexander Shakespeare text of the play, and a user guide for the CD-ROM.

results.title: Romeo and Juliet (Luhrmann) (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Baz Luhrmann, Gabriella Martinelli and Bazmark
results.brief_description: Baz Luhrmann, director of “Strictly Ballroom” tells the greatest love story of all time in our time. William Shakespeare’s classic tale of star-crossed lovers is set in Verona Beach; a violent modern city of guns, money and greed. In this opulent world of hate, rival gangs, and families at war Romeo and Juliet are ignited by the passion of forbidden first love and Verona Beach explodes. Shakespeare’s heart wrenching tale of doomed love is told with passion, beauty, wit and furious energy. It’s a film that will kick you in the heart.

results.title: Romeo and Juliet
results.creator_credit: George Cukor, Irving G. Thalberg and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: This lavish production of Shakespeare’s Romeo and Juliet features Leslie Howard and Norma Shearer as the star-crossed lovers. Cast also includes John Barrymore, Edna May Oliver, Basil Rathbone, C. Aubrey Smith, Andy Devine.

results.title: Rome falls to Allies. Invasion of Fortress Europe.
results.brief_description: ROME FALLS TO ALLIES focuses on the liberation of Rome by Allied soldiers. Shows: tanks advancing into Rome; Lieutenant General Mark Clark Commander of the 5th Army; arrest of Fascists and capture of prisoners; Pope Pius XII leading a thanksgiving prayer at St Peter’s Square in the Vatican. INVASION OF FORTRESS EUROPE follows the Allied forces as they cross the English Channel and land on the shores of Normanby to defeat the Germans’s Army impregnable coastal defenses. Includes footage of Lieutenant General Louis A. Brereton, Lieutenant General Omar M. Bradley, General Eisenhower and Allied Field Commander General Montgomery.

results.title: Rome and Pompeii
results.brief_description: The magnificence or Rome and Pompeii as they were about 2,000 years ago is reconstructed before your eyes. See the Colosseum, as it stood, with 50,000 Romans applauding the bloody gladiator spectacles. Walk the Roman Forum in all its splendour. See the Circus Maximus where 150,000 cheered the chariot races. Gaze at the lavish lifestyles in both Rome and Pompeii - the baths, theatres, temples, palaces and shopping markets. Watch Neros Rome ablaze and Mount Vesuvius devastation of Pompeii, recreated as it might have happened.
